trans-unit.source: Scale and Reduce
trans-unit.target: Scale and Reduce

trans-unit.source: Data Transformation / Scale and Reduce
trans-unit.target: Data Transformation / Scale and Reduce

trans-unit.source: The modules in this group help you clip, bin, and normalize numerical values, as well as reduce the number of columns in the dataset.
trans-unit.target: The modules in this group help you clip, bin, and normalize numerical values, as well as reduce the number of columns in the dataset.

trans-unit.source: Modeling Numbers for Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Modeling Numbers for Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Normalizing, binning, or redistributing numerical variables is an important part of data preparation for many machine learning task.
trans-unit.target: Normalizing, binning, or redistributing numerical variables is an important part of data preparation for many machine learning task.

trans-unit.source: The modules in this group help you perform these critical data preparation tasks:
trans-unit.target: The modules in this group help you perform these critical data preparation tasks:

trans-unit.source: Sorting data into bins of varying sizes or distributions
trans-unit.target: Sorting data into bins of varying sizes or distributions

trans-unit.source: Removing outliers or changing their values
trans-unit.target: Removing outliers or changing their values

trans-unit.source: Normalizing a set of numeric values into a specific range
trans-unit.target: Normalizing a set of numeric values into a specific range

trans-unit.source: Creating a compact set of feature columns from a high-dimension dataset
trans-unit.target: Creating a compact set of feature columns from a high-dimension dataset

trans-unit.source: Related Tasks
trans-unit.target: Related Tasks

trans-unit.source: In addition to these modules, you might find the following related tools useful for transforming numeric data:
trans-unit.target: In addition to these modules, you might find the following related tools useful for transforming numeric data:

trans-unit.source: Selecting the relevant and useful features for use in building the model: <link xlink:href="cc98f178-b2ed-44a0-8b35-8d02b266f20b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Feature Selection Modules</link>
trans-unit.target: Selecting the relevant and useful features for use in building the model: <link xlink:href="cc98f178-b2ed-44a0-8b35-8d02b266f20b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Feature Selection Modules</link>

trans-unit.source: Selecting the most important features based on counts of the values: <link xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation / Learning with Counts</link>
trans-unit.target: Selecting the most important features based on counts of the values: <link xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data Transformation / Learning with Counts</link>

trans-unit.source: Removing or replacing missing values: <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Clean Missing Data</link>
trans-unit.target: Removing or replacing missing values: <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Clean Missing Data</link>

trans-unit.source: Replacing categorical values with numerical values derived from calculations: <link xlink:href="0de80e22-f74e-4e51-a080-e73806a6e00d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Replace Discrete Values</link>
trans-unit.target: Replacing categorical values with numerical values derived from calculations: <link xlink:href="0de80e22-f74e-4e51-a080-e73806a6e00d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Replace Discrete Values</link>

trans-unit.source: Computing a probability distribution for discrete or numerical columns: <link xlink:href="0de80e22-f74e-4e51-a080-e73806a6e00c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Probability function</link>
trans-unit.target: Computing a probability distribution for discrete or numerical columns: <link xlink:href="0de80e22-f74e-4e51-a080-e73806a6e00c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Probability function</link>

trans-unit.source: Filtering and transforming digital signals and waveforms: <link xlink:href="529b4991-8a7f-4e12-8f36-51f9faca4383" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter</link>
trans-unit.target: Filtering and transforming digital signals and waveforms: <link xlink:href="529b4991-8a7f-4e12-8f36-51f9faca4383" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Filter</link>

trans-unit.source: List of Modules
trans-unit.target: List of Modules

trans-unit.source: The category Data Transformation / Scale and Reduce includes these modules:
trans-unit.target: The category Data Transformation / Scale and Reduce includes these modules:

trans-unit.source: Module
trans-unit.target: Module

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Detects outliers and clips or replaces their values
trans-unit.target: Detects outliers and clips or replaces their values

trans-unit.source: Rescales numeric data to constrain dataset values to a standard range
trans-unit.target: Rescales numeric data to constrain dataset values to a standard range

trans-unit.source: Computes a set of features with reduced dimensionality for more efficient learning
trans-unit.target: Computes a set of features with reduced dimensionality for more efficient learning

trans-unit.source: Puts numerical data into bins
trans-unit.target: Puts numerical data into bins
